ModMetaData.name: [Ry]Rimcraft Metals
ModMetaData.author: Ryflamer
ModMetaData.description:
Rimcraft Metals, a fantasy ore sub-mod used for Rimcraft or used stand-alone.
Feature Overview - New WoW-Lore related ores and ingots such as Thorium and Dark Iron, which have special properties.
This mod is very much a work in progress, with the intent to add more custom lore-specific metals fitting within the Warcraft universe. Constructive criticism, suggestions, and ideas are very much appreciated.
For more information or if you're interested in helping with the project, feel free to check out our discord if you have a personal question for me about the mod, or post pictures related to the mod. https://discord.gg/3Dp7Zug
Specific Metal values can be found here, as well as a comparison to how they differ from existing metals. https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MrG2TJ-qC3HCUQsieB-Lm6vZK2D32Si1tvnuCozI1Xk/edit#gid=1086916333 Keep in mind not all ores listed are necessarily implemented in-game.
World of Warcraft inspired content are property of Blizzard Entertainment. Go check out their awesome MMO !
